name: Beach Army War
description:
In this game enemy attack on sea border. Great commando shooter will handle all of enemies in his beach check post . They can move in limited area. But they will use modern weapon like long range gun and double fire gun for strike. Commandos duty is to defend their attack. Mud wall on the front of commando providing him extra ordinary support for attack on enemies.

Every upcoming level will make more interesting and suspicious. Number of enemy will increase in every next level in this shooting game. Smooth control, immersive graphic and sound is present real environment of ocean and mountain.
